title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Learning Trajectory-Based Early Childhood Shape Construction Learning Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric composition theory and comprehension of learning design principles
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Design at least three step-by-step geometric construction activities based on the Learning Trajectory (LT) model
Diagnose learners' current proficiency levels and apply teaching strategies one to two levels above their current level
Measure learning effectiveness using formative assessment tools within the Zone of Proximal Development (ZPD)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
